Help.help PAGE: Displays Help Message, specifying a page will show that help info.

Admin.changeprefix INSERT-SYMBOL: Changes the prefix the bot uses in your server. Available Symbols: ``~!$%^&*()_+-={}[]|\:";\'<>?,.`
Admin.createautorolemsg: Create the reactions for auto role assignment.
Admin.torture MENTION-USER: Stormagedon stalks user into playing Stormjack, where the user may or may not be kicked.

Fun.agify INSERT-NAME: Displays the names of which astronauts are aboard the ISS
Display a random quote, picked by the developers of Stormageddon.

Gaming.d2 status INSERT-BUNGIE-NAME: Displays Destiny 2 account's original creation date, and last API update date.
Gaming.d2 clan INSERT-CLAN-NAME: Displays Destiny 2 clan's bio, avatar, motto, and founder

Music.play SEARCH-TEARM/YOUTUBE-LINK/YOUTUBE-P: Plays the selected music in the voice channel you are in, NOTE: Playlists have a maximum of 30 videos.
Music.volume 1-100: Sets the bots volume in percent.
